descriptionHtml:
This is a simple Mod that adds the Functionality of the Nanosuit to Skyrim.
Since this is obviously a cheatmod, i decided to make it noncraftable and put it into Sovngarde, where you can get it after dealing with Alduin.
Currently, the Armor looks like the Blades Armor, which was unique to have in the Game, that means, it doesn't interfere with other Armor.
The're 4 Armorparts, each with a custom Enchantment.
These mostly boost the Attributes of your Character, but also may make you invisible(by using the Boots, only for 20 seconds).

If you've already finished the Dragonslayerquest and still want the Armor, you can type 'help Nano' in the Commandbox, where it will show you the IDs for the Armorparts.
The Armor may break your game, not by crashing it but by actually making it to easy...

Boots:
-invisibility for 20 seconds
-Sneakability + 9001% probability of not getting caught
-Stamina + 1000 Points
-20 seconds after invisibility of 10001% probability not getting caught
Chestpiece:
- +100% Resist against Fire, Lightning, Ice, Arrows, Deseases and Magic
- + 100.000 Carryweight
- + 1000 Health
- + 2000% of Armor for Light and Heavy Armor.
Gauntlets:
- Stamina + 9000 Points
- Fortify Archery + 1000 Points
- Fortify One- / Twohanded + 200 Points
- Fortify Lockpicking + 9001 Points
- Fortify Pickpocket + 1000 Points
Helmet:
- Speechcraft + 11000 Points
- + 1000 ingameminutes of waterbreathing
- Shoutrecovery/ Health/Archery + 1000 Points
- Persuasion + 100 Points
[Disclaimer]
This does not add the actual Nanosuit, which is protected for use by Crytek only - It only adds an Armor with the nearly same functionality as in Cryteks games.
author: Jake Peterson
